description: MVP-Refinement - Consolidate screens and standardize design system usage

userStories.title: Consolidate Home Screens
userStories.description: Remove root index.tsx and merge any unique logic into app/index.tsx to follow Expo Router conventions.
acceptanceCriteria: Merge any unique logic into app/index.tsx

userStories.title: Standardize Typography
userStories.description: Update app/analysis.tsx to use textStyles from styles/theme.ts instead of local font sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: Replace local font size definitions with textStyles from styles/theme.ts
Maintain visual consistency with existing design
